plot outline: Ratan is an auto-rickshaw driver and an upstanding citizen. He has a family but he is the stepson. But when local MLA Pradip Roy proposes him to do his dirty work he declines and a local war ensues. Ratan wins at every step including falling in love with MLA Pradip Roy's daughter Jhilik Roy.
title: Ekai Eksho
plot: Ratan, an auto driver, decides to take a stand against a corrupt MLA's whims.

Ratan is an auto-rickshaw driver and an upstanding citizen. He has a family but he is the stepson. But when local MLA Pradip Roy proposes him to do his dirty work he declines and a local war ensues. Ratan wins at every step including falling in love with MLA Pradip Roy's daughter Jhilik Roy.
